settings.Select a profile from a specified folder: Select a profile from a specified folder.
settings.The maximum number of tokens, or words,:
The maximum number of tokens, or words, that the model is allowed to generate in its output.
https://platform.openai.com/tokenizer
settings.Temperature controls how random the gene: Temperature controls how random the generated output is. Lower values make the text more predictable, while higher values make it more creative and unpredictable.
settings.Allow chatbot to reference current activ: Allow chatbot to reference current active note during conversation.
settings.Select a prompt to provide additional co: Select a prompt to provide additional context to the system role.
Select a prompt from a specified folder.
settings.Save your chat history in a specified fo: Save your chat history in a specified folder.
settings.Allow model to rename the note title whe: Allow model to rename the note title when saving chat history.
System role for Prompt Select Generate. [Instructions]
settings.Enter your Ollama Base Url using: Enter your Ollama Base Url using Ollama
settings.Select the models to display in the sess: Select the models to display in the session. The selected models will be displayed in the model list.
settings.Test if the Api Key and proxy address ar: Test if the Api Key and proxy address are filled in correctly
settings.langsmith_key_desc: Provide a Langsmith API Key if you want to trace and evaluate the internals of your Chatbot.
settings.verbose_desc: Enable verbose logging in the Developer Console.
settings.Enter your LM Studio Base Url using: Enter your LM Studio Base Url using LM Studio
